name: Close Call Extreme
description:

Add us to your wishlist to get the latest updates. :)

*******************

ALL CHECKED AND CHECKERED!
80's arcade mood is back with Close Call Extreme. It’s endless. It’s challenging. It’s definitely addictive.

Challenge your driving skills, your hawkeye precision and your endless ride stamina.
Can you beat the best and become the ultimate champion?



  • Game is over when time is over. Get the highest score before time is out.
  • You get 10 secs of Extended Time when you pass 10 cars without crashing.
  • Close Call is the key to get high scores quickly. If you are fast and close enough, you'll get score combo when passing opponents. More close calls, more combo!
  • There are no brakes in Fast Blast. Just stop speeding if you want to slow down. :)
  • If you crash, you will be automatically pulled into Pit Stop.



Close Call Extreme is a little yet challenging, short but long, cheap but high-class retro driving game. ;)
With 2D retro graphics, rivals from left and right, endless race track you are invited to an extreme challenge and become the best.

Here are a few tips for you to beat the opponents and get that next cup:
  • This is a challenging game. Control is everything. If you lose control, try to slow down and focus on getting an extended time.
  • Watch those warnings. Track changes are tricky.
  • Don't be fooled. Close Call is an intense challenge. If you lose focus too much just take a break.
  • Keep an eye on the leaderboard. Yes, you can get those scores too if you focus a bit. :)



But remember; it’s not as easy as it sounds.
You have to focus and show your best to become one of the legendary drivers of Close Call.

Having technical problems? Feel free to contact us.
Liked this little bundle of joy? Hooray! ;)
